# Waits Predictor

Count the number of possible tempai hands.

## Build

```
$ mkdir build
$ cd build
$ cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release
$ make
```

## Sample Program

```
$ cd build
$ ./main ../resources/wall_river.txt
```
